panel.label: Controls
panel.name: Controls panel

check_box.label: Arrow keys always move me
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether you want the arrow keys to move your avatar or execute text specific navigation when text or chat bars are selected.
check_box.name: arrow_keys_move_avatar_check

check_box.label: Double-press-hold forward to run
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether double tapping and holding the move forward button will temporarily enable running or not.
check_box.name: tap_tap_hold_to_run

check_box.label: Hold jump key to automatically start flying
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether holding the jump button on the ground will toggle flying on or not.
check_box.name: AutomaticFly

panel.text: Letter keys are used to (A, W, S, D for example):

radio_item.label: Move Me
radio_item.tool_tip: This option allows letters bound to movement actions to move your avatar around rather than always opening the chat bar.
radio_item.name: radio_move

radio_item.label: Start Chat
radio_item.tool_tip: This option will force letters bound to movement actions to open chat at all times regardless of the action they are bound to. This option disabled movement with A W S D keys.
radio_item.name: radio_start_chat

check_box.label: Enable Left-click to Walk (MMORPG Style)
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether you want to allow a left click into the world to make your avatar walk to that specified location via auto pilot or not.
check_box.name: ClickToWalk

check_box.label: Lock the camera in double-click autopilot to your avatar
check_box.name: AutoPilotLocksCamera
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether camera should automatically focus on your avatar when initiating a walk via auto pilot or not.

check_box.label: Use new Movement Animations
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the usage of the improved default animations when walking/running/crouching.
check_box.name: NewWalkRun

check_box.label: Always make Avatar face walking direction
check_box.name: AllowWalkingBackwards
check_box.tool_tip: This option forces the avatar to turn into the direction you are moving. Disabling this will make your avatar walk backwards rather than turning around when moving backwards unless an animation overrider changes this behavior.

slider.label: Avatar Rotation Speed:
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the speed in seconds the avatar takes to turn around when making corrective rotations such as walking backwards. Low values give the avatar a snappier feeling when walking around.
slider.name: RotationSpeed
